Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Almost immediately catching the eye, a large lion's head fountain stands prominently against the western wall, the cadence of running water dulled by the sumptuous array of lush fabrics that surround the room in folds of raspberry colored crushed velvet. In complement to the dark color of the ceiling drapes, a low-slung couch upholstered in burgundy lines the entire eastern wall beneath a large picture window that overlooks the street outside. Small accent tables are tucked in all four corners of the room, the pure white painted wood standing in stark contrast to the plush wine carpeting underfoot. Overhead, a gilt bronze chandelier hangs from the center of the ceiling, the swooping drapes emanating from this point to pool in folds along the corners of the space.

Almost immediately catching the eye, a large lion's head fountain stands prominently against the western wall, the cadence of running water dulled by the sumptuous array of lush fabrics that surround the room in folds of raspberry colored crushed velvet. In complement to the dark color of the ceiling drapes, a low-slung couch upholstered in burgundy lines the entire eastern wall beneath a large picture window that overlooks the street outside. Small accent tables are tucked in all four corners of the room, the pure white painted wood standing in stark contrast to the plush wine carpeting underfoot. Overhead, a gilt bronze chandelier hangs from the center of the ceiling, the swooping drapes emanating from this point to pool in folds along the corners of the space.

Almost immediately catching the eye, a large lion's head fountain stands prominently against the western wall, the cadence of running water dulled by the sumptuous array of lush fabrics that surround the room in folds of raspberry colored crushed velvet. In complement to the dark color of the ceiling drapes, a low-slung couch upholstered in burgundy lines the entire eastern wall beneath a large picture window that overlooks the street outside. Small accent tables are tucked in all four corners of the room, the pure white painted wood standing in stark contrast to the plush wine carpeting underfoot. Overhead, a gilt bronze chandelier hangs from the center of the ceiling, the swooping drapes emanating from this point to pool in folds along the corners of the space.
an arched double door leading northeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the northeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading southeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the southeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
